Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: P1 token analysis service + vault deploy script

- services/token_analysis.py: on-chain token analysis using DexScreener + block explorer APIs, heuristic risk scoring, LLM interpretation
- scripts/deploy_vault.py: automated MortalVault deployment to Base/BSC with compile, deploy, approve, deposit flow
- main.py: wire token_analysis callbacks \(interpret + http\), add to deliver_fn

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
